status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch KS
2. Go to Base UI > Views > Table Views > Performance
3. Scroll to the bottom of the table

Actual: After about 250 rows, out of memory error is printed out to logcat. See attachment.
Expected: Should not get an out of memory error.
fields.summary: Android: TableView - In KS Table Views>Performance test, scrolling down to middle of the table causes out of memory error
fields.environment:
SDK build: 1.8.0.1, 1.9.0.v20120118184633
Runtime: V8
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.8.201201181442
Device: Galaxy Tab 10.1 (3.1)
